titleStmt.title: An act for the ascertaining the time of payment of the monies due upon VVeavers-Hall bills.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Friday the Seventeenth of December, 1652. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
With Parliamentary seal at head of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
